generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with a white line running down the center, viewed from the perspective of a vehicle.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are standing and walking on the raised edges of the road, which are clearly sidewalks.
- building: Multiple buildings with windows, shutters, and balconies are visible on both sides of the street.
- fence: Black metal fences line both sides of the sidewalk.
- pole: A street light pole is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a number 30 is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Flowering plants and bushes are visible along the fences on both sides of the sidewalk.
- person: Several people are visible walking or standing on the sidewalks.
- car: The front of a car, including the Mercedes-Benz emblem, is visible at the bottom of the image.
